questions.quote: Oh, you gotta be kiddin'! You see those two ladies I got showin'? Do they look scared?!
Hey, Dad. You know you can program this thing to beep every time you need to take a vitamin.  Dad, you look so different.
Yeah, well...not exactly. I mean, she said, you know, she called this morning and said she had to come in for a seminar and maybe we'll get together.
He could be eating a gyro, he wouldn't offer me anything. It's a sickness.
No, don't say a word. If she thinks my friends are jerks, then I'm a *jerk*...
It is too small for someone with such a big mouth . Let me ask you. What will you do if Martine wakes up? Run away like a mouse?
Well I.. ran out onto the court an' threw a hotdog at Reggie Miller. "Involved." An' they threw meee, an' Reggie, an' Spike out o' the game.
Oh, we're meeting a friend of ours for lunch. He works here in the building.
Just stick with the story. We'll be fine. Let me do the talking!
I'd love to, but I don't know anything about him. He could be one of those people that walks around the street pricking people with pins.
